page.title: 26Dairy Farming
page.content:
The farm used to describe Dairy Farming in the 1986 accounts is thought to have been Rosebank Farm, which is situated in Craigluscar Road. In 1986 this farm was a dairy farm but it is no longer a dairy farm.

Easter Clune Farm which is situated west of Rosebank Farm is still a dairy farm and they are building a new milking parlour. Also Carneil Farm in the village of Carnock is also a dairy farm. However dairy farming in this area has decreased over the past years and a lot of farms are just arable farms (they just grow crops).


Milesmark Primary School
